name: MONOWARS: Red Zone
description:
Warp into battle against massive monochrome networks controlled by the CrimsonSync AI group. Upgrade your tank and your army as the enemy adapts against your one conquestive mission; eliminating all of them.

This is the start of a new franchise MONOWARS. A action shooter bird's eye view game based off of the conquering of networks controlled by enemy AI cores of the opposite color. Upgrade your tank's abilities and unlock new units to strengthen yourself and your army to stand a better chance at defeating all of the enemy.
